title: We Left None Alive (6C97)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a [Rohan] Man to place 2 [Rohan] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a [Rohan] token from here to make a [Rohan] Man skirmishing an exhausted minion strength +2.
Rarity:	C
